pages.text: In $(thing)Crucial 2$() you may run into an array of new $(item)Status Effects$() which can either help you or hurt you in your adventures.$(br2)These status effects can be inflicted by many sources, whether it be from items you can consume or from mobs who may attack you.

To locate some of the items you can obtain status effects from, you can use $(item)JEI$() to search for items by the effect that they apply. If you want to know even more about what effects an item can apply you can even use $(item)Advanced Tooltips$() ($(thing)F3$() + $(thing)H$()) to list them!$(br2)The following pages will provide some insight into what the various status effects in this modpack can do.

pages.description_1: Allows climbing onto any vertical surface.
pages.description_2: Increases attack damage as more mobs are killed.

pages.description_1: Removes and prevents weakness, slowness, and hunger status effects from being applied.
pages.description_2: Allows seeing the places where monsters can spawn. There may be a $(thing)Gossip$() entry that can provide more insight here.

pages.description_1: Applied by Enderiophages, and will cause another one to spawn once the effect is over, inflicting damage in the process.
pages.description_2: Increases the duration of newly applied effects.

pages.description_1: Once this effect is applied, the next consumed food will fill more food points. Afterwards, the effect is removed.
pages.description_2: Greatly slows down movement speed, and slowly inflicts damage. Inflicted by an icey illager foe.

pages.description_1: Extinguishes burning if not in a fire source. Also reduces damage from burning and slowly applies regeneration.
pages.description_2: Causes Unicorns in a radius of 500 blocks to obtain the glowing effect, making them easier to locate.

pages.description_1: Causes nearby monsters in the vicinity to run away.
pages.description_2: Slowly causes damage until at half a heart, and can also be spread to other entities through attacking them.

pages.description_1: Increases insomnia levels.
pages.description_2: Prevents receiving knockback from incoming attacks.

pages.description_1: Allows seeing under lava, as if it were like water.
pages.description_2: Causes one to become a light source.

pages.description_1: Prevents losing hunger from any action besides healing.
pages.description_2: Grants increased attack speed after swimming with Orcas.

pages.description_1: Boosts movement speed after being hit while wearing a Healer's Pouch.
pages.description_2: Increases movement speed proportional to greater hunger.

pages.description_1: When one with this effect attacks an entity, it copies their own movement onto the entity.
pages.description_2: Reduces the amount of damage taken from attacks.

pages.description_1: Applies poison to any mobs collided with.
pages.description_2: Prevents receiving knockback from incoming attacks.

pages.description_1: Decreases insomnia levels.
pages.description_2: Prevents mobs from spawning nearby. There may be a $(thing)Gossip$() entry that can provide more insight here.

pages.description_1: Makes it hard to stand still, as if slipping around. Can be caused by stepping on a banana peel.
pages.description_2: Attacking enemies will have the chance to steal some of their health.

pages.description_1: Causes the rapid spitting of seeds as long as the effect is active.
pages.description_2: Causes the damage one takes to also inflict poison.

pages.description_1: Increases movement speed at the start of the status effect, but movement will begin to slow down as the effect goes on.
pages.description_2: Makes falling occur slower, and also makes it easier to fly with an elytra.

pages.description_1: Makes falling occur faster, making it almost impossible to fly with an elytra.
pages.description_2: Makes some entities behave as if it were daytime. A type of cow that blooms flowers on its back may be handy in harnessing this effect.

pages.description_1: Applies regeneration, strength, or resistance to nearby mobs depending if they're passive, neutral, or hostile.
pages.description_2: Increases the food points filled when consuming foods.

pages.description_1: Provides immunity to thorny damage sources.
pages.description_2: Blocks any incoming status effects from being applied.

pages.description_1: Applies regeneration to any mobs collided with.
pages.description_2: Increases the amount of damage taken from attacks.
